Attacks.Name: Dragon Tail
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, push the target character away short range.

Attacks.Name: Thunder Wave
Attacks.Effect: The target character gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Tail
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Shed Skin
Superpowers.Effect: Roll one die. On a result (crit, wild, or hit), remove one special condition from this character.

Attacks.Name: Dragon Pulse
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, push the target character away short range.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Dragonite character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
